docs.snippet: The actual cost of the presidential election recount in Wisconsin is expected to be about $1.8 million, nearly half of the estimated cost of $3.5 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: The actual cost of the presidential election recount in Wisconsin is expected to be about $1.8 million, nearly half of the estimated cost of $3.5 million.

headline.main: Final Costs of Wisconsin Presidential Recount Will Be Lower

docs.snippet: Israel released billionaire businessman Beny Steinmetz from house arrest without charge on Wednesday, his mining firm BSG Resources (BSGR) and a court spokeswoman said, following his detention over bribery allegations involving BSGR in Africa....

docs.snippet: Ireland's Finance Ministry said on Wednesday it expected its budget deficit to be around 0.9 percent in 2016, in line with the last official forecast in October but weaker than Finance Minister Michael Noonan suggested in comments last month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ireland's Finance Ministry said on Wednesday it expected its budget deficit to be around 0.9 percent in 2016, in line with the last official forecast in October but weaker than Finance Minister Michael Noonan suggested in comments last month.

headline.main: Ireland Sees 2016 Budget Deficit of 0.9 Percent of GDP
headline.print_headline: Ireland Sees 2016 Budget Deficit of 0.9 Percent of GDP

docs.snippet: The United States is in talks with Turkey about the future support the U.S. military will provide Turkish forces around al-Bab, Syria, a U.S. military spokesman said on Wednesday, adding that he expected the assistance to continue....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States is in talks with Turkey about the future support the U.S. military will provide Turkish forces around al-Bab, Syria, a U.S. military spokesman said on Wednesday, adding that he expected the assistance to continue.

headline.main: U.S. Likely to Keep Supporting Turkish Troops Near Al-Bab: U.S. Military
headline.print_headline: U.S. Likely to Keep Supporting Turkish Troops Near Al-Bab: U.S. Military
